title: Development and evaluation of vaccination strategies for addressing the continuous evolution SARS-CoV-2 based on recombinant trimeric protein technology: Potential for cross-neutralizing activity and broad coronavirus response
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Peng Du, Ning Li, Shengjun Tang, Zhongcheng Zhou, Zhihai Liu, Taorui Wang, Jiahui Li, Simiao Zeng, Juan Chen
